subject: Hello My Good Friend,
body:
Hello My Good Friend,
How are you doing? Hope you have not forgotten me, I am Dr.Usman
Bello, the man from Nigeria who contacted you some time ago to assist
me secure the release of some money accrued from the over invoicing of
a contract/inheritance that was awarded by my government some time ago
during the military regime.
Though you were not able to assist me conclude the transaction, I'm
happy to inform you about my success in getting those funds
transferred under the assistance and cooperation of a new partner from
Brazil. Presently I’m in London-United Kingdom for investment projects
with my own share of the total sum.
meanwhile, I didn't forget your past efforts and attempts to assist me
in transferring those funds, I made sure you are not left out the
benefit of the transaction hence I kept aside for you sum of Five
Hundred Thousand Dollars (500,000.00)Via ATM Card.
I and my new partner agreed to compensate you with that amount for all
your past efforts and attempt to assist me in this matter. I
appreciated your efforts at that time very much, so feel free and get
in touch with my secretary Mr. John Oge, and let him know how you want
your ATM Card to be Send to you.
Please do let me know immediately you receive the ATM Card so that we
can share the joy together after all the suffer-ness at that time. At
the moment, I’m very busy here because of the investment projects
which me and my partner are having at hand.I left instruction to my
secretary Mr. John Oge, so as soon as you contact him, he will send
the ATM Card to you, so feel free to get in touch with my secretary.
                          Below is the contact of my secretary:
Name: Mr. John Oge
Email 
mr.john_oge09@yahoo.com
)
With Best Regards
Dr.Usman Bello

subject: Re:   Hello My Good Friend,
body:
Dear Bello,

I'm glad to hear that you were successful in your endeavors. I appreciate your kind gesture of remembering my past efforts and attempts to assist you.

However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding further. Could you please provide more details about the ATM card? How can I use it and are there any charges associated with it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Betty
